Name: NICFI
Description: Norway’s International Climate and Forest Initiative (NICFI): 5m resolution multispectral.

Name: INPE
Description: Brazilian National Institute for Space Research National Institute for Space Research (INPE): multispectral data at 20/30m resolution and delivers official annual rates of forest loss for Brazil (1988-2021). The publicly available annual maps are all corrected/edited manually by experts and contain polygons with the following labels: forest, non-forest, deforestation of the year, previous deforestation, clouds, and water.

Name: IGN
Description: Lidar HD: 3D topography of the aboveground of France. They give access to 50x50km square areas with 1x1km tiles. Points are classified into 11 classes including high middle and low level vegetation.

Name: CEO
Description: Collect Earth Online (CEO): collect high resolution satelitte imagery fore forest land cover. Tens for locations all around the world, no annotations but the access is free and open source.

Name: Global Forest Watch
Description: Global Forest Watch: more details to come (lots of different source of data).

Name: EFISCEN
Description: EFISCEN: a large database of forest inventories in 32 European countries, from forest to tree level.

Name: Opendrop
Description: Citizen science-based UAV data

Name: Openaerialmap
Description: Citizen science-based UAV data

Name: Geonadir
Description: Citizen science-based UAV data

Name: iNaturalist
Description: iNaturalist: Citizen community recording and manually labeling images or automatically provide a label

Name: NEON
Description: NEON: large scale data provider in the US

Name: Gbif
Description: TBD

Name: Forest information system for europe
Description: TBD

Name: OpenTrees
Description: TBD

Name: BIEN
Description: Botanical information and ecology network

Name: ForetOuverte
Description: Forest inventories in Québec

Name: ForestResearch
Description: Forest inventories in Great Britain

Name: FIA
Description: US Forest Inventory Analysis

Name: MODIS/VIIR
Description: Fire forest data in US / Canda using MODIS and VIIRS

Name: Mapbiomas
Description: Mapbiomas Brasil is a platform to download land use and land cover maps

Name: ForestGeo
Description: Forest Global Earth Observatory (ForestGEO), data portal where network partners can login and enter, review, and download their data and other researchers can request access to any dataset
